actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT apple.publicidentifier,apple.firstName,apple.lastName, apple.phoneNumber,apple.email as "Candidate Email",apple.location,apple.companies,apple.educations,apple.headline,apple.summary,
apple.score,apple.relevantExperience, users.uid as "Scout ID",users.firstname as "Scout FirstName", users.email as "Scout Email"
FROM users
JOIN(
    SELECT people.publicidentifier,people.firstName,people.lastName, people.phoneNumber,people.locationfilter,people.email,people.location,people.companies,people.educations,people.headline,people.summary,people.score,people.relevantExperience,referred_people.addedby,referred_people.addedon
    FROM referred_people
    JOIN people
    ON people.publicidentifier = referred_people.publicidentifier
    WHERE (people.companies LIKE '%{{Role.text}}%'
        OR people.headline LIKE '%{{Role.text}}%'
        OR people.summary LIKE '%{{Role.text}}%')
		AND (people.companies LIKE '%{{Skill.text}}%'
        OR people.headline LIKE '%{{Skill.text}}%'
        OR people.summary LIKE '%{{Skill.text}}%')
		AND (people.companies LIKE '%{{Company.text}}%')
		AND (people.educations LIKE '%{{College.text}}%')
    AND (people.location LIKE '%{{Location.text}}%')
    AND (people.relevantExperience >{{minExp.text}} AND people.relevantExperience <{{maxExp.text}})
    ORDER BY referred_people.addedon ASC
    ) as apple
ON users.uid = apple.addedby
GROUP BY apple.publicidentifier
ORDER BY apple.score DESC
LIMIT 500;
